input.sentences: boyfriend and girlfriend visiting the town .
it was a rainy and cold day .
organization organization boots shaped christmas mugs .
buying holiday sweets at the bakery .
eating out after a long day .
output.sentences: The man was visiting a small town to see his grilfriend.
The weather was rainy on the day he arrived which made it rather cold.
They found cute boot shaped cups due to the lack of organization in a shop, so he bought one of the mugs for his girlfriend.
After, the two were craving sweets and made holiday treats instead of buying some.
